# cds-skeleton

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                 | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `circle`         | `circle`          | Display as a circle                                         | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `color`          | `color`           | Base color                                                  | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `count`          | `count`           | The number of times the skeleton element should be repeated | `number`  | `1`         |
| `duration`       | `duration`        | Animation duration                                          | `number`  | `1.2`       |
| `height`         | `height`          | Height                                                      | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `highlightColor` | `highlight-color` | Highlight color                                             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `squared`        | `squared`         | Display squared                                             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `width`          | `width`           | Width                                                       | `string`  | `undefined` |
